services.WebDevDec: Building tailored web applications using modern technologies like Django, React.js, Flask, and Node.js. Whether it's an eCommerce platform or a simple business website, I ensure efficient and scalable solutions that meet your business needs.
services.FullstackDec: Providing end-to-end development for both web and mobile applications. From back-end logic with Python and Django/Flask to responsive front-end interfaces using React.js, Angular, or Next.js. Additionally, offering mobile app development with React Native to ensure a seamless experience across both platforms.
services.AIDec: Integrating AI models into your applications to enhance user experiences or automate processes. This includes natural language processing, content generation, or custom AI-based tools.
services.mentoringDec: Offering personalized mentoring for aspiring developers or teams looking to improve their skills in full-stack development, AI integration, or DevOps. With over 5 years of real-world experience, I can help guide you through coding best practices, project management (Agile/Scrum), and effective software development workflows.

contact.Description: Iâ€™d love to help you bring your ideas to life! Whether you need                 high-performance software solutions or support for your                 open-source project, feel free to send a request. Letâ€™s work                 together to create something amazing.
contact.TextAreaPlaceholder: Tell me a bit about your business, website domain, or repository, and what you'd like to achieve. The more details you provide, the better I can assist you!
contact.reach-you-msg: I'll get back to you soon.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Full-stack developer with a focus on Python, AI, and emerging tech like Brain-Computer Interfaces. I build smart, scalable, and user-friendly solutions.

SEO.title: Seyed Hossein Hosseini Website and portfolio
SEO.description: Seyed Hossein Hosseini's Website showcases expertise in full-stack development, offering innovative solutions for businesses and startups in web and mobile application development.

SEO.author: Seyed Hossein Hosseini

group1.title: Enterprise Solutions
group1.description: Graph Company provides various services to organizations to identify threats before an attack occurs and handle incidents after they occur, as well as to prevent the spread of contamination and data theft. These services are provided specifically for Graph customers, and the incident handling team will be at the customer's location in Tehran in less than 1 hour. For other organizations that do not use Graph products, this time will be between 2 and 4 hours after the announcement time.

group2.title: Digital Innovation
group2.description: At Neerus, we are pioneering the future of human-machine interaction by leveraging cutting-edge neuroscience to create a revolutionary Brain-Computer Interface. Our mission is to empower individuals to connect seamlessly with the digital world using the power of their minds.

group3.title: Tech Consulting
group3.description: Our team is committed to creating groundbreaking robotic systems that enhance productivity and streamline operations. By integrating advanced technologies, we deliver solutions that are not only effective but also transformative.  We tackle the toughest challenges in robotics and mechatronics, providing our clients with innovative solutions that lead to significant improvements in their operations. Our dedication to excellence ensures that we stay at the forefront of the industry.
